"air.com.forteGames.svaraMobile"	"SVARA BY FORTEGAMES ( SVARKA )"	"100000"	"4"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">Rules of the game Svara ( Svarka )<br><br>Svara ( Svarka ) is a card game that is played with a deck of 32 cards - from 7 to Ace . The minimum number of players is two . The total number of combinations in the game is 4960<br><br>Rules<br>-------------<br>Each player is dealt three cards in a clockwise direction . Each card combination has a specific numerical value. Winner is the player with highest points.<br><br>The value of the points is calculated by the following rules:<br>1) Each card from 7 to 9 give 7 to 9 points respectivly.<br>2 ) The cards 10 , J, Q, K and give 10 points.<br>3 ) Aces give 11 points .<br>4 ) The cards of the same color have as many points as their sum . For instance :<br>Q ♦, K ♦ 10 ♠ give a total of 20 points and 10 ♠, 8 ♠ K ♥ give a total of 18 points ;<br>5 ) Aces can be combined regardless of the color that is to say two ace are 22 points , three are 33 points<br>6) 7 ♣ is called "" Ceco Jonchev , Chechak , Chotora , Shpoka or Yoncho "" and can be combined with all other cards for 11 points .<br>8 ) Three of a 7 gives 34 points and this is the strongest combination in the game.<br>9) Three of a kind combinations are carrying as many points as the lead card. For example , three of 8 bring 24 copies / 3x8 = 24 / : three of Q give 30 points / 3x10 = 30 / etc<br><br>examples<br>--------------<br>7 ♥, 9 ♦ 9 ♣ give a total of 9 points (this is the worst hand ) ;<br>10 ♠, 10 ♦ 10 ♣ give a total of 30 points ;<br>8 ♣, K ♥ 9 ♦ give a total of 10 points ;<br>K ♥, 9 ♥ Q ♣ give a total of 19 points ;<br>Q ♣, Q ♥ 9 ♦ give a total of 10 points ;<br>A ♠, A ♦ 10 ♣ givea total of 22 points ;<br>8 ♠, A ♦ 7 ♣ givea total of 22 points ;<br>10 ♦, 9 ♦ J ♦ give a total of 29 points ;<br>Q ♣, Q ♥ Q ♦ give a total of 30 points ;<br>7 ♣, K ♥ K ♦ give a total of 31 points ;<br>7 ♣, A ♥ A ♦ give a total of 33 points ;<br>Two of 7 no matter the suits give a total of 23 points ;<br><br>Betting<br>--------------<br>1 ) Before the cards are dealt to the players each player bets a certain amount called ante;<br>2 ) Player that is located left to the dealer make his anounces. Before seeing his cards he is allowed to bet a certain amount called blind bet;<br>3 ) If a player make a blind bet, the next player to his left has the option to double the blind bet;<br>4 ) If a player skips the blind bet the next player is not allowed to make new blind bet;<br>(Blind bets are optional)<br>5 ) After the cards are dealt to the players they make their bets;<br>6 ) If there is a blind bet, the next player should at least double the bet;<br>7 ) If the player that made the blind bet wnats to see the cards of the other players he must pay the bet.<br>8 ) If there is a blind bet and no one pay it, the winner is the player that made the last blind bet;<br>9 ) The game wins the players with highest points;<br>10 ) If there is no blind bet and no other player makes a bet the winner is the dealer;<br>11) If two or more players have the same number of points we have SVARA;<br>12) SVARA is a new game that includes all the bets from the previous game;<br>13) Any player is allowed to join the SVARA after he pay the SVARA join amount.</div>"	"0.00"	"Casino"	"4256"

A bingo ticket is a card with a 5x5 grid. 5 columns on the card correspond to 5 letters of the name of the game ""B-I-N-G-O"". 24 numbers per each card are random from the limits of 1 to 75. After that the game begins, and the caller selects numbers at a random and calls them. Numbers such as B-2 or N-68 are then drawn at random until one player completes a 'Bingo' pattern, such as a line with five numbers in a vertical, horizontal or diagonal row on one of their cards and shouts Bingo. The caller keeps calling numbers until one or more players claim Bingo. There are many possible patterns to play for.  <br><br>The numbers in the columns of a ticket are selected at random and printed according to the range - numbers in the B column are from 1 to 15, in the I column between 16 and 30, in the N column between 31 and 45, in the G column between 46 and 60, and in the O column between 61 and 75.<br>Can the game of Bingo Christmas help you get smarter? Slot machines are also known as one-armed bandits because they were originally operated by one lever on the side of the machine as opposed to a button on the front panel, and because of their ability to leave the gamer impoverished. In the end, the player with the highest ranking hand wins the total chips bet (Pot).<br><br>Cards are ranked as follows (From High to low):<br>1. Trail/Trio/Three of a kind: Three cards of the same rank.<br>2. Pure Sequence/Pure run/Straight Flush: Three consecutive cards of the same suit.<br>3. Sequence/Normal Run/Straight: Three consecutive cards not all in the same suit.<br>4. Color/Flush: Three cards of the same suit that are not in sequence.<br>5. Pair/Two of a kind: Two cards of the same rank.<br>6. High Card: Three cards that do not belong to any of the above types.<br><br>That’s all you need to know to start playing teen patti!<br><br>So download the free Teen Patti Unlimited Club app now! Indian poker and card games will never be the same!!</div>"	"0.00"	"Casino"	"517"

"com.begench.seka"	"SEKA"	"10000"	"3.8"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">Seka is a customized poker game. Play with your friends and have fun.<br>Here are the rules.<br><br>Deck <br><br>This card game is played with a deck of 33 standard cards. All cards have their face value in points. The following list shows value of the points, equivalent for each card.<br>•	Aces - 11<br>•	Kings - 10<br>•	Queens - 10<br>•	Jacks - 10<br>•	Tens - 10<br>•	Nines - 9<br>•	Eights - 8<br>•	Sevens - 7<br>Six cross (clubs) is the exception (joker). It performs the role of a Joker and has a face value of eleven points.<br><br>Counting points<br><br>Points are counted depending on cards and their suits. Card points are summed up of three identical cards and their points are considered to be higher than the sum of the points of the same suits. The number of points at landing of three identical cards is calculated in the following list. The sum of the game of three cards is considered to be higher than the game of two cards.<br>•	Three Aces - 33<br>•	Three Queens - 30<br>•	Three Jacks - 30<br>•	Three Tens – 30<br>•	Three Nines - 27<br>•	Three Eights - 24<br>•	Three Sevens – 21<br>•	Two Aces - 22<br>Jokers play the role of any cards on situation.<br><br>Game process<br><br>All players make a minimum bet in the beginning of the game.<br>Game begins with shuffling and dealing of cards. Each player gets three cards.<br>Player that is located left to the dealer makes the first move.<br>""Blind bet"" - means doing half of a bet not seeing your cards.<br><br>The player who goes first has the option to choose ""a blind bet"" or ""to skip it"" or to “bet” (they can see their cards)<br>If he chooses ""a blind bet"", then the next players can also ""blind bet"" but he has to bet 1.5 bets more than the previous player who made ""a blind bet"" before the player who has chosen ""to skip"".<br>When everybody saw their cards, then take turns in the same way to make moves.<br>When it is player’s turn to act, he or she can perform one of the following actions:<br><br>• Bet — A player can bet maximum amount that was set in beginning of game or unlimited if it was set so, as long as the bet is equal to or greater than the size of the big blind. If a player bets, his bet becomes the value for taking part in subsequent betting; players sitting on his left can continue competing for the pot only if they call or raise. They also can refuse to compete for the current pot by folding.<br><br>• Call — If there has already been a bet, calling means that a player agrees to  match the bet. In other words, if player A bets 10, and player B calls, player B will have to match the 10 bet and put 10 into the pot.<br><br>• Raise — A raise is a bet made atop another bet. If a bet was made in the current round, a player can raise it. In order to do so, he or she must make a bet at least twice the size of the previous player’s bet. To continue competing for the pot, all the subsequent players must call or re-raise; otherwise they will fold.<br><br>• Fold — Folding means to refuse to compete for the current pot. If a player folds, the player’s cards do not participate in the hand anymore and cannot win in the current round.<br><br>After the round passed, starting with the player who was the first, any of players if he didn't pass, can be ""opened"".<br><br>When player decides to “Open”, he must put in Bank the amount equal to the current bet and should declare: ""I open for so much. And put the sum but not higher than maximum bet and higher minimum bet"" This means that this player sets the amount for which other players must make the next move.<br>• To pass and fold cards.<br>• To add to Bank the amount equal to bet of previous player.<br>• To increase the rate of turn.<br>After the round of betting again comes to player, who decided to ""open"". He can Click on ""open"". If no one increased his bet of ""open"" To increase the rate of turn. After which all cards except passed ones open<br> <br>The Bank is taken by the player with the highest points.</div>"	"0.00"	"Casino"	"60"

"com.bingo.tambola"	"Tambola"	"50000"	"3.7"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">Tambola, also known as Tombola, Indian Bingo or Housie is a popular game that is believed to be originated in Italy in early 1500s. The game is fun to play and easy to learn. <br><br>All of us have played Tambola at social gatherings, office get-togethers, kitty parties and society events.<br><br>Tambola can be played in many different ways depending on the competency level.<br>American version of  Tambola is called ‘Bingo’ and it is slightly different from Tambola.<br><br>Each player must buy at least one ticket to enter a game. Tambola is played with Numbers (1-90) being called out one at a time and players striking out those Numbers on their Tickets. It contains 27 spaces, arranged in nine columns by three rows. Each row contains five numbers and four blank spaces. Each column contains up to three numbers, with some variation depending on Bingo or <br><br>Tambola companies and/or where the game is played.<br><br>The first column contains numbers from 1 to 9 (or 10), the second column numbers from 10 (or 11) to 20, the third, 20 (or 21) to 30 and so on up until the last column, which contains numbers from 81 to 90.<br><br>The game begins with a ball draw. As the game progresses, the board is marked with each ball that is drawn. The objective of the game is to mark/ dab all the numbers found in the ticket as called by the dealer. The player who first mark all the numbers in a winning pattern and calls a win is declared as the WINNER of that pattern after the dealer checks his ticket and verify it with numbers drawn.<br><br>If your claimed winning pattern is wrong, it will be called BOGUS and you cannot continue the game with the same ticket.<br><br>The game ends when all 90 numbers are drawn, or when a winner is declared for all the patterns of the game, whichever comes first.<br><br>In order to win in Tambola or Bingo, you need to match winning combinations. Some of the popular winning combinations in a Tambola game are:<br><br>Early Five : The ticket with first five number dabbed<br>Top Line: The ticket with all the numbers of the top row dabbed fastest.<br>Middle Line: The ticket with all the numbers of the middle row dabbed fastest.<br>Bottom Line: The ticket with the numbers of the bottom row dabbed fasted.<br>Four Corners: The ticket with all four corners marked first i.e. 1st and last numbers of top and bottom rows.<br>Full House: The ticket with all the 15 numbers marked first.<br><br>There are many more winning patterns in Tambola .<br><br>Tambola is a game of chance. A great entertainer and family game. We term this as a game which connects friends and family throughout globe !!<br><br>Don’t have the game with you? "com.bluewind.spanish21"	"Spanish Blackjack 21"	"1000"	"4.4"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">Spanish 21 is a variation of blackjack, that in some cases is the best bet in the casino. In locations where the dealer stands on a soft 17, or redoubling is allowed, Spanish 21 may be a better bet than blackjack, depending on the specific blackjack rules. If you are looking for a change of pace from traditional blackjack but insist on a game with a low house edge, then you may find new excitement in Spanish 21.<br><br>Key feature: <br><br>* Gorgeous HD graphics and slick, fast gameplay<br>* Realistic sounds, and smooth animations<br>* Fast and clean interface.<br>* Offline playable: you dont need an internet connection to play this game, it run perfectly fine when offline<br>* Constant playing: you don't need to wait for other player to play this game<br>* Completely free: you don't need any money to play this game, the chips in the game are also free to get.<br><br>Here are the full rules of the game.<br><br>Spanish 21 uses six or eight Spanish decks, each deck consisting of 48 cards — the regular 52 cards less the four tens. Any card counter can tell you that removing any 10-point card from the cards moves the odds in favor of the dealer. To make up for this, Spanish 21 gives the player a host of bonuses and favorable rules. There are lots of Spanish 21 games all over the country, so rules will vary somewhat from place to place, but the usual rules in the player's favor are:<br><br>+ Late surrender allowed.<br>+ Double after split allowed.<br>+ Re-splitting aces allowed.<br>+ A player 21 always wins.<br>+ Player blackjack beats dealer blackjack.<br>+ Player may double on any number of cards.<br>+ Player may usually hit and double down after splitting aces.<br>+ Player may surrender after doubling, known as ""double down rescue."" The player forfeits an amount equal to his original bet.<br>+ A five-card 21 pays 3 to 2, a six-card 21 pays 2 to 1, a seven or more card 21 pays 3 to 1. Bonus not honored after doubling.<br>+ A 6-7-8 or 7-7-7 of mixed suits pays 3 to 2, of the same suit pays 2 to 1, and of spades pays 3 to 1. These bonuses do not pay after doubling.<br>+ Suited 7-7-7 when the dealer has a seven face up pays $1000 for bets of $5-$24 and $5000 ""Super Bonus"" for bets of $25 or over. In addition, all other players receive a $50 ""envy bonus."" Without a doubt, it is the most popular table game in the United States. <br><br>The objective of the game is to beat the dealer. In order to beat the dealer, you need to get cards that get you close to 21, but not over. While not going over 21, you have to outscore the dealer or have him go bust. <br><br>When the game of blackjack 21 starts the player is dealt with a two cards and add together the value of their cards. The Face cards which are kings, queens and jacks are counted as 10 points. The dealer and the player count an ace as 1 point or 11 points, and all other cards are counted according to the numeric value shown on the card. The players after receiving their first two cards, have an option of getting a hit by taking an additional card, Stand, Double or Split. The player or the dealer wins by having a score of 21 or by having the higher score that is less than 21. <br><br>Having a score higher than 21 is going bust or called busting which will result in a loss. Each card has five rows and five columns. The columns are labeled from left to right with the letters ""B,"" ""I,"" ""N,"" ""G,"" and ""O."" The center square is designated ""free."" The five squares in column B contain different numbers selected from the interval 1 to 15. Column I contains five numbers from the interval 16 to 30. Column N contains four numbers from the interval 31 to 45. Column G contains five numbers from the interval 46 to 60, and column O contains five numbers from the interval 61 to 75.<br><br>An announcer randomly selects numbers from 1 to 75, calling out each one while the player mark the appropriate grid square if that number appears on their card. In Standard Classic Bingo, the player's goal is to be the first to mark an entire row, column, or diagonal. There are 12 winning configurations. Eight of these configurations do not involve the use of the center ""free"" space, whereas four (column N, row 3, and the diagonals) do.<br><br>What makes the game suspenseful is the tantalizing uncertainty about achieving Bingo.<br><br>So, what are you waiting for? It is played on a computerized console similar in size to a slot machine. <br>There are many variations of video poker but the play is simple:  You're dealt five cards.  You decide which ones to keep by tapping the pictures on the screen or pressing buttons on the console. Then you hit the DRAW button and you get replacement cards for the cards you didn't keep. You win if you wind up with a traditional poker hand like two pair, straight, flush, etc. The amount you win per hand depends on the pay table of the machine you're playing. Pay tables allocate the payouts for hands and are based on how rare they are, the game variation, and the decision of the game operator. A typical pay table starts with a minimum hand of a pair of jacks, which pays even money. All the other hand combinations in video poker are the same as in table poker, including such hands as two pair, three of a kind, straight (a sequence of 5 cards of different suits), flush (any 5 cards of the same suit), full house (a pair and a three of a kind), four of a kind (four cards of the same value), straight flush (5 consecutive cards of the same suit) and royal flush (a Ten, a Jack, a Queen, a King and an Ace of the same suit).<br>In games which do not have a wild card a player on average will receive the rare four-of-a-kind hand approximately once every 500 hands. Your odds of hitting a royal flush (the top jackpot) are about 1 in 40,000.  At 600 hands an hour and 8 hours a day, you can expect to hit a royal once every 8.3 days on average.  But the odds of hitting a slot jackpot are 1 in 262,000 approximately, so you're far more likely to hit the jackpot with video poker.<br>These are some of the variations of video poker:<br>Jacks or Better: The game to start with if you are new to video poker and also the most common game you will find on casino floors. Jacks or Better has a relatively low variance as well as a good pay back on the full pay versions.<br>Deuces Wild: As the name suggests, on Deuces Wild all of the cards with a value of two are wild. This adds a pay for five of a kind, a wild royal flush and the all-important four of a kind deuces. <br><br>************************<br>SAY HELLO<br>************************<br>We are constantly working hard on making the “Deuces Wild - Video Poker” game better and more entertaining for you. "com.housiebook"	"Housie Book - Tambola, Bingo Online Live Games"	"10000"	"3.8"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">Housie Book is an online live game to play tambola/housie game with friedns. You can play with the users from all over the world.<br><br>Tambola Rules<br>Tambola, also known as Tombola, Bingo or Housie is a popular game that is believed to be originated in Italy in early 1500s. Although Bingo is the name used in most of the western countries, India, Pakistan and other South East Asian countries prefer to call this game of probability as Tambola or Tombola. The game is fun to play and easy to learn. The rules of Tambola are as given below:<br><br>Tambola Tickets<br>As a rule, each player must buy at least one ticket to enter a game. A typical 90 ball Tambola ticket consists of 3 rows and 9 columns which make 27 spaces. Each row has a total of 5 numbers printed on it. A column can have 1, 2 or the maximum 3 numbers printed on it. The first column in the ticket will have numbers from 1-9, the second column will have 10-19, third column with 20-29 and so on until the 9th column which will be numbered in between 80-90.<br><br>Gameplay<br>The game begins with a ball draw. As the game progresses, the board is marked with each ball that is drawn. The objective of the game is to mark/ dab all the numbers found in the ticket as called by the dealer. The player who first mark all the numbers in a winning pattern and calls a win is declared as the WINNER of that pattern after the dealer checks his ticket and verify it with numbers drawn.<br><br>The game ends when all 90 numbers are drawn, or when a winner is declared for all the patterns of the game, whichever comes first.<br><br>Tambola Winning Patterns<br>In order to win in Tambola or Bingo, you need to match winning combinations. Some of the popular winning combinations in a Tambola game are given below:<br><br>Early Five : The ticket with first five number dabbed<br>Top Line: The ticket with all the numbers of the top row dabbed fastest.<br>Middle Line: The ticket with all the numbers of the middle row dabbed fastest.<br>Bottom Line: The ticket with the numbers of the bottom row dabbed fasted.<br>Full House: The ticket with all the 15 numbers marked first.<br>There are more than 22 winning patterns in Tambola and prizes for each pattern may vary also depending on the pattern the player claims.</div>"	"0.00"	"Casino"	"187"

The Ante bet is compulsory whereas other two bets are optional.<br><br>You can start playing the 3 Card Poker as soon as you open our game with 100,000 Bonus chips.<br><br><br><b>How To play :</b><br>1. Select the poker chips and then click on the desired bet area on the table. <br>2. After placing the bet, the player is dealt with three cards face up and the dealer with three cards face down. <br>3. The player has the option to fold the hand or raise if he thinks he can beat the dealer's poker hand. <br>4. If the player folds, he loses his ante bet. <br>5. If the player raises, then an additional Play bet is made equal to the Ante bet and the dealer reveals his cards. <br>6. The dealer qualifies only if he has Queen High or better. <br>7. If the dealer doesn’t qualify, player wins 1 to 1 on Ante bet and Play bet will push. <br>8. If the dealer qualifies, the higher poker hand between the player and the dealer wins. <br>- If the player wins, he will get 1 to 1 on both Ante and Play bets. <br>- If the dealer wins, player loses both the Ante and Play bets. <br>- In case of a tie, Ante bet and Play bet will push. <br>9. If the player has a Straight Poker Hand or higher, then he receives an Ante bonus. <br>10. The Pair Plus bet wins if the player's hand has a Pair or higher. <br>11. The 6-Card Bonus bet wins based on the highest 5-card hand that is made out of player’s and dealer’s 6 cards combined.<br>12. Bring out the real gambler in you!<br><br>★★★For Support and Feedback★★★ <br>contact@rnftechnologies.com <br>http://www.facebook.com/Phonato<br><br>★★★More About Roulette★★★<br>Roulette is a casino game named after a French diminutive for little wheel. In the game, players may choose to place roulette bets on either a single number or a range of numbers, the colors red or black, or whether the number is odd or even. The roulette odds are based on probability.<br><br>To determine the winning number and color, a croupier spins a wheel in one direction, then spins a ball in the opposite direction around a tilted circular track running around the circumference of the wheel. The ball eventually loses momentum and falls on to the wheel and into one of 37 (in French/European roulette) or 38 (in American roulette) colored and numbered pockets on the wheel.<br><br>Roulette players have a variety of betting options. Placing inside roulette bets is either selecting the exact number of the pocket the ball will land in, or a small range of pockets based on their proximity on the layout. Players wishing to bet on the 'outside' will select roulette bets on larger positional groupings of pockets, the pocket color, or whether the winning number is odd or even. The payout roulette odds for each type of bet are based on its probability.<br><br>The roulette table usually imposes minimum and maximum bets, and these rules usually apply separately for all of a player's inside and outside roulette bets for each spin. For inside roulette bets at roulette tables, some casinos may use separate roulette table chips of various colors to distinguish players at the table. Players can continue to place roulette bets as the ball spins around the wheel until the dealer announces no more roulette bets.<br><br>When a winning number and color is determined by the roulette wheel, the dealer will place a marker, also known as a dolly, on that winning number on the roulette table layout. When the dolly is on the table, no players may place roulette bets, collect roulette bets, or remove any roulette bets from the table. The dealer will then sweep away all other losing roulette bets either by hand or rake, and determine all of the payouts to the remaining inside and outside winning roulette bets. When the dealer is finished making payouts, the marker is removed from the roulette board where players collect their winnings and make new bets. The winning chips remain on the roulette board.<br><br>Roulette wheel number sequence<br><br>The pockets of the roulette wheel are numbered from 1 to 36.<br>In number ranges from 1 to 10 and 19 to 28, odd numbers are red and even are black. In ranges from 11 to 18 and 29 to 36, odd numbers are black and even are red.<br>There is a green pocket numbered 0 (zero). In American roulette, there is a second green pocket marked 00.<br>★★★ <br>For more information on the game or the app in general, feel free to contact us.<br>★★★</div>"	"0.00"	"Casino"	"9102"

Non Stop Blackjack 21 fun is here!<br>Blackjack is also know as 21 or twenty-one is a widely played casino banking game. <br><br>Blackjack 21 is a comparing card game between a player and a dealer, meaning players will compete against a dealer but not against other players and is played with one or more decks of 52 cards. <br><br>A Blackjack 21 game can be won in the following ways:<br><br>✔ Getting 21 points on the player's first 2 cards which is called a 'blackjack', 'natural' assuming the dealer has not got a blackjack<br>✔ Get a score higher than the dealer without exceeding 21<br>✔ Allowing the dealer to draw additional cards until his hand exceeds 21<br><br>When the game of blackjack 21 starts the player or players are dealt with a two card hand and add together the value of their cards. The Face cards which are kings, queens and jacks are counted as 10 points. The dealer and the player count an ace as 1 point or 11 points, and all other cards are counted according to the numeric value shown on the card. The players after receiving their first two cards, have an option of getting a hit or taking an additional card. The player or the dealer wins by having a score of 21 or by having the higher score that is less than 21. Having a score higher than 21 is going bust or called busting which will result in a loss. "com.sunbeach.sicbo"	"Sic Bo (Tai Xiu) - Multiplayer Casino"	"10000"	"4.2"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">Sic-Bo is a popular Dice game in Macao and Las-Vegas casinos. It is played in the Philippines as hi-lo and in some places as dai siu or tai sai<br>Play with your social friends on our modern multiplayer tables. There are various tables to choose from as you cross Levels and unlock bigger Casino rooms. <br><br>How to Play:<br>The betting options available at Sic Bo are formed by the various combinations obtained with three dice.  These wagers and their payouts are reproduced on the gaming table.  Players may wager on as many combinations as desired per game.  The dice are shaken by dealer, by means of a vibrating platform under a round shape glass cover.  After all bets have been made, the dealer activates the dice shaker.  The outcome of each of the three dice appears on the display.  <br><br>The payout is given on the basis of rules and outcome of dice .<br><br>There are 8 different ways you can bet.<br><br>1) You can bet on one number, which must appear on all three dice.  This is called a Three of a Kind.  Obviously, you have the least chances of hitting a winning bet, as there are 216 (6 X 6 X 6) dice combinations and only one of them can give you a 1,1,1 or 2,2,2 or 3,3,3 or 4,4,4 or 5,5,5 or 6,6,6.  <br><br>2) You can bet on one number, which must appear on two of the three dice.  This is called a Two of a Kind, such as a 1,1 or 2,2 or 3,3 or 4,4 or 5,5, or 6,6.  <br><br>3) You can bet that the same number from 1 to 6 will appear on all three dice, such as either a 1,1,1 or 2,2,2 or 3,3,3 or 4,4,4 or 5,5,5 or 6,6,6.  This is called Any Three of a Kind and it pays 24 to 1.  <br><br>4) There is an area called Small, that pays even money, where you bet that the sum of the three dice will be equal to 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, or 10 excluding a Three of a Kind.  <br><br>5) Similarly, there is an area called Big, that also pays even money, where you bet that the sum of the three dice will be equal to 11, 12, 13, 14, 15, 16, or 17 excluding a Three of a Kind.  <br><br>6) On the Sic Bo layout, there is a wide area with the numbers 4 to 17 written on them.  <br><br>7) You can bet on two different numbers, which must appear on at least two of the three dice.  This bet is called Duo, and it pays 5 to 1.  The dice combinations you can bet on are: 1,2 or 1,3 or 1,4 or 1,5 or 1,6 or 2,3 or 2,4 or 2,5 or 2,6 or 3,4 or 3,5 or 3,6 or 4,5 or 4,6 or 5,6, as long as the two numbers are not the same.<br><br>8) And the last type of bet is called a simple One of a Kind, where you bet on a single number that must appear on one, two or all three dice.  This is shown in the layout as the dice face 1, or 2, or 3, or 4, or 5, or 6.<br><br>Features:<br>1. Multiple rooms<br>2. Multiple Tables<br>3. 5 player on single Tables<br>4. Timer Based bets in multi-player mode <br>5. Send/ Receive  Gift to/from  Friends <br>6. Bet from $1 to $2000000 on various tables<br>7. Rank based on your level<br>8. Invite Friends to play with you<br>9. Multiple Levels <br>10.Low and High stakes Table<br>11. Leader-board to compete your score with other players<br>12.Hourly bonus<br>13.Sounds ,Notifications<br>14.Practice mode to learn the game <br>15.Offline mode if you dont want to play with others<br>16.Guest mode to hide your identity<br>17.Login Bonus<br>18.Play in virtual casino environment<br><br>More  Tables coming soon <br>We don't save any details with us .</div>"	"0.00"	"Casino"	"173"

So, the lowest ranking combination in Classic Teen Patti has the highest rank in Muflis, and vice versa. For example, if you have 7-2-3 while the other player has a trail of 3-3-3, then you will be the winner.<br><br>♥Hukam - A random card is chosen and displayed on the table. All other cards of the same rank/number, regardless of their type or color, will act as a Joker and can be used as a replacement for any other card. <br><br>♥AK47 - In AK47, you treat all the Aces (A), Kings (K), Fours (4) and Sevens (7) as Jokers. You can use all of these cards as replacements for any card. "com.xraystudiogame.flight"	"Aeroplane Chess"	"100000"	"4"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">Two to four players each try to get all their own plane pieces from their hangars, located at the corners of the board, into the base of their own color in the center of the board. Each player takes a turn by rolling the dice. On a turn a player may do the following: <br><br>1.Taxi a piece out of the hangar onto the board. This can only be done by rolling an even number. <br><br>2.Move a piece that's on the board clockwise around the track, the number of spaces indicated by the dice. <br><br>Additional rules are: <br><br>1.A roll of 6, whether it's used to enter or move a piece, gives that player another roll. A second 6 gives the player a third roll. If the player rolls a third 6, any pieces moved by the first two 6's must return to their hangar and play passes to the next player. <br><br>2.When a player lands on an opponent's piece, the opponent returns that piece to its hangar. <br><br>3.When a plane lands on a space of its own color, it immediately jumps to the next space of its own color. Any opposing planes sitting on these squares are sent back to their hangars. <br><br>4.There are additional ""shortcut"" squares. When a plane lands on one of these of its own color, it may take the shortcut, and any opposing planes in the path of the shortcut are sent back to their hangars.This may also by done in succession with the previous rule, with a jump leading to shortcut. Some also play that a direct land on a shortcut may be followed by a jump. <br><br>5.When a plane lands on another plane in its own fleet, the player may ""stack"" the pieces and move them as one piece until they reach the center or are landed on by an opponent. When stacked pieces are sent back to their hangar by an opponent landing on them, they are no longer stacked. <br><br>Ending the game <br>Plane must fly into the center base on an exact roll. When a plane does so, it is placed facedown back in its own hangar, indicating that it is done for the game. The first player to get all of four of their planes to the center of the board wins. The rest play until there is only one loser.</div>"	"0.00"	"Casino"	"2087"

This means that players have better chances than other roulette tables, such as the American one, which has more boxes.<br>The two main sections of the table on which the stakes are placed are the internal and external parts. Each one offers different betting modes.<br>The inner part offers bets on single numbers or groups of numbers that are close to each other on the table layout for up to six numbers with a single episode.<br>The exterior offers the possibility to focus on pairs of options such as: red or black, high or low or even and odd or odd (each of which covers 18 numbers). You can also make six different episodes of 12 numbers (divided into two types, three columns and three dozens).<br>In addition, betting groups of 7 to 17 numbers are available, placed on different wheel segments. These bets can be placed by clicking on the outer oval (' racetrack'), the part of the table that reproduces exactly the order in which the numbers are shown on the wheel, unlike the numerical order in which the numbers are placed in the main layout for bets.<br><br><br><br>Any comments or suggestions for improving the app can be sent to dossetto@dvg.store</b></div>"	"0.00"	"Casino"	"327"

"totomi.android.HorseRacing.Activity.F"	"電動間賽馬遊戲機-Horse Racing Slot"	"50000"	"4.2"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">電動間賽馬機 Horse Racing Slot<br><br>大型機台的賽馬，台灣80年代紅極一時的賭博性電玩，至今己有30年以上歷史 ，早期抓的不嚴的時候甚至得分是可以直接退現金下來的，現在能退代幣就很好了，糟的還退彩卷甚至不退。目前遊樂場或是夜市偶爾還看的到。<br><br>這款賽馬沒有獨贏的押法，取前二名(先後不計)押中就可得到彩金，如押1-2，只要前二名是1號馬與2號馬皆可中獎；遊戲可設定跑六匹馬或七匹馬，或是二種混合。<br><br>開跑後畫面中間會出現 Bonus ，只要中獎的號碼出現在 Bonus中，原來的賠率加上Bonus的賠率讓您贏得更高的彩金，Bonus號碼完全照街機公式跑，然後偶爾會開出Bonus加100分或加50的，中吃到加分的根本是發了一筆小財。<br><br>本遊戲有獨特的開洗分機制，可以模擬當老闆，讓您可以開分給親朋好友玩，大家一起回味這款複古的賽馬遊戲，如要開分讓別人玩，請自行輸入密碼，並牢計開分員編號即可，( 盈虧自負，本軟體不介入老闆與賭客的糾紛) 。<br><br>本遊戲賠率採抽牌公式，抽中什麼就出什麼，不會跳牌閃牌，也沒有『咬不死機制』，機台會『吃小吐大』，盡量留住押大的客人，所以押越大越容易開大牌中大彩金。<br><br>本遊戲屬單機模擬賭弈遊戲，不用儲值，不用註冊，不用登入，完全免費，請安心下載遊玩。<br><br>遊戲特色：<br><br>＊每次登入後即會產生不同的開分員編號，也可以不輸入密碼直接遊玩。<br>＊開洗分後請老闆與玩家記住『開分員編號』，如果在洗分時開號不正確，就表示有人更動過系統，請自行處理解決。<br>＊可自定馬匹數，有六匹、七匹、或二種輪流。<br>＊有開Bonus一定是有押注的，不會開空包彈，押越大出Bonus的機率會高。<br>＊50倍或100倍的Bonus是必中牌，其他會照出牌公式開牌。<br>＊可設定『吃小吐大』比，盡量留住押大的客人，在條件許可情況下，押小會盡量吃錢，押大就會盡量吐，比值越大輸贏比越明顯。<br>＊可設定抽水比例，不論押多押少，抽越大咬越多一視同人(慎用)<br>＊此遊戲出牌照內容的牌譜出，並非絕機率，但抽中的就一定會出，絕不跳牌，閃牌。<br><br>遊戲說明網頁： http://totomif60.blogspot.com/2015/10/horse-racing.html<br>手動下載安裝位置： https://app.box.com/s/umxsbcoh1jel1uxhx0nrd4j8f66ctb4t</div>"	"0.00"	"Casino"	"324"

"totomi.android.NobleLion.Activity.F"	"萬獸獅王輪盤機 Noble Lion Slot"	"1000"	"4.4"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">＊萬獸獅王輪盤機 Noble Lion Slot<br><br>『萬獸獅王輪盤機』是在轉盤類賭場遊戲，四種動物與三種顏色，組合成12門押注。每種動物有不同的倍率，獅子倍率最高，兔子倍率最低，動物的位置與數量是固定的，但顏色的位置會變，數量也會因賠率而不同。遊戲開始後，畫面中的『動物轉盤』和『指針』開始轉動，當轉輪與指針停足後，指針指向的顏色和動物（必須同時滿足）就是中獎動物，玩家可贏得押注彩金。<br><br><br>遊戲特色：<br><br>＊每次登入後即會產生不同的開分員編號，也可以不輸入密碼直接遊玩。<br>＊開洗分後請老闆與玩家記住『開分員編號』，如果在洗分時開號不正確，就表示有人更動過系統，請自行處理解決。<br>＊不定時送燈，可自定送燈數量，不會送空包彈，不會送兔子。<br>＊可自定高賠率(50~2)與低賠率(46~4)，各有三種賭率輪流，衫色燈數也會隨之改變。也可自定是否跳賠率。<br>＊可設定『吃小吐大』比，盡量留住押大的客人，在條件許可情況下，押小會盡量吃錢，押大就會盡量吐，比值越大輸贏比越明顯。<br>＊可設定抽水比例，不論押多押少，抽越大咬越多一視同人(慎用)<br><br><br>＊開洗分方法：<br>在押注畫面時，畫面左上角會出現『請按此開洗分』，點擊之後即可開洗分，如果有設定開分員密碼的話，開洗分時會要求輸入開分員密碼，並且開分完成後會顯示一組數字，請雙方記注這組數字。<br><br><br>＊大清方法：<br>在登入時重新設定密碼即可，第一次登入或重設密碼後，機台儲金桶會歸零。<br><br>官方說明網頁： http://totomif60.blogspot.tw/2015/07/blog-post.html</div>"	"0.00"	"Casino"	"37"
"totomi.android.Poker5PK.Activity.F"	"5PK撲克王(Life)"	"10000"	"4.2"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">5PK撲克王(LIFE)<br><br><br>＊完美重現街機經典五張撲克遊戲。<br><br><br>在遊戲中，玩家共有兩次機會取得中獎牌型，第一次先發出５張牌，您可使用點選畫面上的撲克牌，保留或放棄的牌張，可以全部都換，也可以全部保留，確定選擇後按下「換牌」按鈕，即開始第二次發牌。一副撲克牌含鬼牌共54張，遊戲中鬼牌可以取代任何牌，大幅提昇中獎機率！一局牌，換牌？不換牌？如何運用鬼牌，考驗您的運氣與智慧！<br><br><br>＊您採收的彩金，是別人堆肥堆出來的。<br><br><br><br>5PK撲克王機率採用街機計算常用儲金桶機制，而非單純出牌機率，押多少都會放進儲金桶內，而中得彩金也會從儲金桶取出，除非機台大清，否則儲金桶的錢不會歸零。<br><br>本遊戲機率為 100% ，吸多少就會吐多少，在彩金堆的夠高時，輕鬆拿到同花大順，五玫等高彩金手牌，而手牌的大小，比倍的大小，推測機台有多少儲金，是當肥料還是採收者，看您的經驗而定。<br><br><br>遊戲特色：<br>＊獨特開洗分功能，標準賠率計算，模擬街機5PK。<br>＊以自己當老闆，開分給朋友，同學玩，不論是當肥料還是採收獎金，大人小孩都可以小試一下手氣。<br>＊每次登入後即會產生不同的開分員編號，也可以不輸入密碼直接遊玩。<br>＊開洗分後請老闆與玩家記住『開分員編號』，如果在洗分時開號不正確，就表示有人更動過系統，請自行處理解決。<br>＊可以設定積錢率與押注上限。<br>＊按功能鍵可自行調整或關閉音樂音效的音量。<br>＊最佳螢幕解析為 480 * 800 ，其他解析度並不影響遊戲進行。<br><br><br>＊大清方法：<br>在登入時重新設定密碼即可，第一次登入或重設密碼後，機台儲金桶會歸零，此時拿到的牌會很難看，如果開分給親朋好友玩的話，可能會因機台沒錢而無法出大獎，或是一直咬錢，被朋友大罵奸商還好，若因此破壞友誼與朋友信任可不好了，建議在大清之後，自己開分打一點錢進去，多少隨意，以免出的牌太難看。若沒必要，建議不要進行大清。<br><br><br>＊開洗分方法：<br>在押注畫面時，畫面左上角會出現『請按此開洗分』，點擊之後即可開洗分，如果有設定開分員密碼的話，開洗分時會要求輸入開分員密碼，並且開分完成後會顯示一組數字，請雙方記注這組數字，如數字有變過表示有人改過密碼或偷開分，此時請自行私下解決。<br><br><br>＊賠率表：<br>同花大順：250倍，不含鬼牌的A,K,Q,J,10同花順。<br>五玫：100倍，鐵支加鬼牌。<br>同花順：60倍<br>鐵支：40倍<br>胡蘆：10倍<br>同花：7倍<br>順子：5倍<br>三條：4倍<br>兩對：3倍<br>大對：2倍，J,Q,K,A對子。<br><br>。鬼牌可以取代任何牌。<br><br>＊比倍：<br>中獎以選擇要不要比倍，本遊戲比倍為猜大小，七點不分輸贏，最多比五關。猜中大小彩金加倍。<br><br><br>注意事項：<br>＊本遊戲嚴禁金錢賭博。如有違反法律請自行負責。<br>＊本遊戲採用街機計算常用儲金桶機制，而非單純出牌機率，押多少都會放進儲金桶內，沒有暗藏任何中獎密技，請老闆玩家盈虧自負。<br>＊本遊戲純娛樂，如有規則或程式的問題，造成老闆或玩家的損失或爭議，請私下解決。<br>＊如要調整音樂音量大小，請按硬體面版下方的『選項鈕Menu』(在Home隔壁)，如無法順利下載安裝，請到說明網頁參考其他下載安裝方式。</div>"	"0.00"	"Casino"	"144"
"totomi.android.Poker7PK.Activity.F"	"7PK撲克王(Life)"	"10000"	"3.7"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">7PK撲克王(LIFE)<br><br><br><br>＊完美重現街機經典7PK帶牌公式的撲克遊戲。<br><br>基本玩法：<br>7PK的原名為7 poker，每局牌局都會發出7張牌，只要其中5張牌湊出牌型如三條、順子、同花、葫蘆等，就可以獲得獎金。。<br><br>押注完成開局後，直接發七張牌，然後翻開第1,3張牌，此時進行第一次加注，可以選擇『加注』或是『開牌』，若選擇『加注』則加一倍底注，接著翻開第5張牌，進行第二次加注，若再選擇『加注』則翻開第6張牌，進行第三次加注，此時不論是選『加注』或是『開牌』，就會把剩餘的牌翻完，接著進行結算。<br><br>若詢問加注時選擇『開牌』，則不再詢問加注直接翻開全部撲克牌後結算，<br><br>遊戲流程為：翻第一張牌→翻第三張牌→第一次加注→翻第五張牌→第二次加注→翻第六張牌→第三次加注→翻剩餘的牌→結算。<br><br><br>帶牌公式：<br>7PK的迷人之處在於有公式可依循，牌局發出來的7張牌中，前3張牌可以預測出後3張會出什麼牌，除基本注之外有三次加注機會，玩家可以先下個一兩注試試水溫，遇見有利的情形再大膽全押，是一款熟悉玩法之後就能確實達到趨吉避凶，越玩越上手的策略型撲克遊戲。<br><br>一局七張牌中，第一張牌會影響第五張牌，第三張牌會影響第七張牌，第二張牌會影響第七張牌，帶牌公式分成『一帶』與『二帶』，同局中只會有一帶或二帶，不會兩種帶牌法混合，所以在第一次加注後翻第五張牌時，可以藉由第一張，第五張牌知道是『一帶』還是『二帶』，進而預測其它的撲克牌，決定接下來是否繼續加注或是直接開牌結算，以提高中獎獎金。<br><br><br>＊您採收的彩金，是別人堆肥堆出來的。<br><br><br><br>7PK撲克王機率採用街機計算常用儲金桶機制，而非單純出牌機率，押多少都會放進儲金桶內，而中得彩金也會從儲金桶取出，除非機台大清，否則儲金桶的錢不會歸零。<br><br>本遊戲機率為 100% ，吸多少就會吐多少，在彩金堆的夠高時，輕鬆拿到同花大順，五玫等高彩金手牌，而手牌的大小，比倍的大小，推測機台有多少儲金，是當肥料還是採收者，看您的經驗而定。<br><br><br><br>遊戲特色：<br>＊獨特開洗分功能，標準賠率計算，模擬街機7PK。<br>＊以自己當老闆，開分給朋友，同學玩，不論是當肥料還是採收獎金，大人小孩都可以小試一下手氣。<br>＊每次登入後即會產生不同的開分員編號，也可以不輸入密碼直接遊玩。<br>＊開洗分後請老闆與玩家記住『開分員編號』，如果在洗分時開號不正確，就表示有人更動過系統，請自行處理解決。<br>＊可以設定積錢率與押注上限。<br>＊按功能鍵可自行調整或關閉音樂音效的音量。<br>＊最佳螢幕解析為 480 * 800 ，其他解析度並不影響遊戲進行。<br><br><br>＊大清方法：<br>在登入時重新設定密碼即可，第一次登入或重設密碼後，機台儲金桶會歸零，此時拿到的牌會很難看，如果開分給親朋好友玩的話，可能會因機台沒錢而無法出大獎，或是一直咬錢，被朋友大罵奸商還好，若因此破壞友誼與朋友信任可不好了，建議在大清之後，自己開分打一點錢進去，多少隨意，以免出的牌太難看。若沒必要，建議不要進行大清。<br><br><br><br>＊開洗分方法：<br>在押注畫面時，畫面左上角會出現『請按此開洗分』，點擊之後即可開洗分，如果有設定開分員密碼的話，開洗分時會要求輸入開分員密碼，並且開分完成後會顯示一組數字，請雙方記注這組數字，如數字有變過表示有人改過密碼或偷開分，此時請自行私下解決。<br><br><br>＊賠率表：<br>同花大順：500倍，不含鬼牌的A,K,Q,J,10同花順。<br>五玫：200倍，鐵支加鬼牌。<br>同花順：120倍<br>鐵支：50倍<br>胡蘆：7倍<br>同花：5倍<br>順子：3倍<br>三條：2倍<br>兩對：1倍<br><br>。鬼牌可以取代任何牌。<br>。手牌中若可以組成二種以上的牌型時，以最大牌型為中獎彩金。<br><br>＊比倍：<br>中獎以選擇要不要比倍，本遊戲比倍為猜大小，七點不分輸贏，最多比五關。猜中大小彩金加倍。<br><br><br><br>注意事項：<br>＊本軟體手機與平版都可使用。最佳解析度為480*800。<br>＊本遊戲嚴禁金錢賭博。如有違反法律請自行負責。<br>＊本遊戲採用街機計算常用儲金桶機制，而非單純出牌機率，押多少都會放進儲金桶內，沒有暗藏任何中獎密技，請老闆玩家盈虧自負。<br>＊本遊戲純娛樂，如有規則或程式的問題，造成老闆或玩家的損失或爭議，請私下解決。<br>＊如要調整音樂音量大小，請按硬體面版下方的『選項鈕Menu』(在Home隔壁)，如無法順利下載安裝，請到說明網頁參考其他下載安裝方式。</div>"	"0.00"	"Casino"	"134"
